channel.title: Kotlin on Shaheer Muzammil
channel.description: Recent content in Kotlin on Shaheer Muzammil

item.title: PhotoTune by VYRO AI
item.description:
PhotoTune is a photo enhancement tool by Vyro AI that gathered more than Half a million downloads in less than a quarter of its release in early 2022.

PhotoTunes’s main features:

  • Super resolute your photoes to 2x/3x/4x resolution
  • Beautify your portraits by removing blemishes, smoothing your skin and adding HDR
  • HDR delivers a higher contrast photo with reduced haze and noise
  • Colorise adds color to old and black & white photos

item.title: PhotoStudio by VYRO AI
item.description:
Photo Studio is an all-in-one pro photo editing application with creative tool to stylise and enhance your images with 1M+ downloads since its inception in June 2021.

PhotoStudio Main Features:

  • Crop the Photos to any dimension and adjust it for any social platform you want to share
  • Use trending filters for your photos and popular filter categories available
  • Use Sky Changer feature and replace sky from your photos to beautiful skies
  • Use the Background eraser feature to erase and replace 100+ backgrounds
  • Use Cloths feature to change Texture of your cloths to new stylish textures
  • Use Adjustment tool to adjust and polish your photos
  • Use LightFx to beautify photos with transparent Overlays
  • Add text to photos with 100+ unique fonts
  • Add stickers to pictures and create your own stickers
  • Use Defocus Blur backgrounds feature to provide depth blur effects
  • Enhance Photos up to 2x and 4x. Edit blurry, old, low quality, noisy photos
  • Enhance your Face in photos using portrait enhance
  • Bring old photos to life and give them colorize effect

item.title: SURF Rideshare
item.description:
An entertainment platform that places interactive tablets in ride-share vehicles for the entertainment of passengers and the promotion of local businesses and brands which provides;

  • Free Video content to stream by Media gaints like Paramount Pictures, Vevo and many famous content creators like Tasty, The Daily Show, etc.
  • Full iHeart Radio experience where the riders can listen to iHearts best Radio station, their favourite artists and highly engaging podcasts.
  • Free coupons and disounts to nearby stores and shops

item.title: Recording
item.description:
A simple android voice recording application I created a while back. It has following features;

  • Record audio. Pause/Resume between a recording.
  • Control recording bitrate.
  • Save recording to local storage in a folder named Recording.
  • View, Rename or delete all recordings.
